hero.subtitle: A Kingdom That Welcomes Everyone
hero.description: Welcome to chibivue.land - a kingdom on the internet. Meet kawaiko, our duck symbol!

kingdom.title: The Kingdom
kingdom.description: chibivue.land is an imaginary kingdom on the internet, a creative and welcoming space for everyone to call home.

kawaiko.title: Meet kawaiko
kawaiko.description: Our adorable duck symbol who guides visitors through the kingdom and spreads joy in the community.

vue.title: Everyone Welcome
vue.description: A warm and inclusive community where people from all backgrounds come together to learn, share, and create amazing things.

building.title: Writing & Speaking

join.title: Join the Kingdom
join.description: Become a citizen of chibivue.land! Connect with wonderful people on Discord and be part of our warm, welcoming community.

aboutPage.title: About chibivue.land
aboutPage.description: The story of a community that grew naturally

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: chibivue.land was originally created by {founder} for the chibivue book project ({book}).
story.p2: However, it naturally evolved into an internet community, and its role expanded over time. Today, it has become a warm kingdom where people from all backgrounds gather without barriers.
story.p3: The kingdom is home to kawaiko (かわいこちゃん), our beloved duck symbol who represents the friendly nature of our community and the fact that everyone is welcome here.

birth.title: The Kingdom is Born
birth.description: chibivue.land was established as the home of the chibivue project and community.

growth.title: Community Growth
growth.description: The community expanded with new contributors and learners joining the kingdom.

future.title: Continuing the Journey
future.description: We continue to grow, learn, and build together in our kingdom.

kawaiko.title: Meet kawaiko
kawaiko.description: kawaiko (かわいこちゃん) is the symbol of our kingdom. A duck who watches over all.
kawaiko.fact1: Species: A very cute duck (かわいい鴨)

kingdom.title: The Chronicle of Foundation
kingdom.lore1: Long ago, in the chaotic sea called the Internet, a pioneer appeared. His name was ubugeeei. He peered into the abyss of Vue.js and authored a tome called "chibivue" that unraveled its inner workings. This scripture guided many lost souls, and before long, those who shared his vision began to gather around him.
kingdom.lore2: Thus was born chibivue.land. At first, it was merely a small domain for the book, but drawn by the virtue of King ubugeeei, people of all backgrounds naturally gathered, and it became a kingdom. A strange nation with no borders, no ranks—connected only by the simple desire to "be here."
kingdom.lore3: Yet at some point, the king vanished. He became a spirit king, a curse god, never to appear before mortals again. But fear not. Those whom the king appointed as aides during his lifetime carry on the founding spirit, preserving the kingdom's culture and history. They embody the king's will and warmly welcome new travelers.
kingdom.lore4: The kingdom's symbol, "kawaiko," reigns as one who watches over all. Despite the adorable appearance, kawaiko gazes upon the kingdom's fate with enlightened eyes. Under kawaiko's blessing, this kingdom breathes quietly yet surely, even today.
kingdom.loreNote: * This chronicle was generated by an LLM
kingdom.entrance: The gates of the kingdom are always open. The entrance lies in Discord.

chibivue.name: chibivue
chibivue.description: An online book for learning Vue.js internals by building a minimal implementation from scratch.

land.name: chibivue.land
land.description: The official website of chibivue.land kingdom, built with Nuxt and TresJS.

vueyous.name: VueYous
vueyous.description: A minimal replicate of VueUse. An educational project for learning how to build composable functions.

zennPlaza.name: Zenn Plaza

chibinuxt.name: chibinuxt
chibinuxt.description: A minimal implementation project for learning Nuxt internals.

chibivitest.name: chibivitest
chibivitest.description: A minimal implementation project for learning Vitest internals.

writing.title: Writing & Speaking
writing.description: We collaborate on writing articles and giving talks, sharing knowledge with the wider community.
